clinical_study.official_title: Therapy and Prevention for Sexually Associated Bacterial Vaginosis

brief_summary.textblock: We are trying to determine if longer duration of therapy with metronidazole or combination therapy of metronidazole plus azithromycin results in better cure rates for BV

primary_outcome.description: percent of women without BV at follow up

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Symptomatic bacterial vaginosis
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnancy
- Other genital infections
